data.name: Christmas Tree, Decorated
data.description:
Create a magical function, `decoratedTree(height, deco)`, that will generate a decorated Christmas tree of an arbitrary height with an arbitrary number of _decorations_ per branch.

`decoratedTree(7, 2)` must return:

```
      @      
      ~      
     ~oo     
    ~~~~o    
   oo~~~~~   
  ~~~oo~~~~  
 ~~~~~~oo~~~ 
~~~~~~~~~oo~~
      #      
```

`@` and `#` does not count as a part of the tree-height, as these are decorations.

Use `\n` for new line at each branch.

**NB:** If you're stuck, try completing [Christmas tree](http://www.codewars.com/kata/christmas-tree/javascript) by [Muscula](http://www.codewars.com/users/Muscula), who I stole the concept for, for this Kata.
